channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Airbnb is quietly rolling out an AI customer service bot in the US
item.description: Airbnb started rolling out an AI-powered customer service bot in the U.S. last month, CEO Brian Chesky said during the firm’s first-quarter conference...

item.title: Focal Bathys MG Review: Gorgeous Sound for a Pretty Penny
item.description: The Focal Bathys MG hyper-premium noise-canceling headphones have French drivers designed for real audiophiles.

item.title: Apple changes US App Store rules to let apps link to external payment systems
item.description: Apple has changed its App Store rules in the U.S. to let apps link users to their own websites so they can buy subscriptions or other digital goods. T...

item.title: Brendan Carr Is Turning the FCC Into MAGA’s Censoring Machine
item.description: Under its new chairman, the FCC is threatening broadcasters and pushing President Donald Trump’s agenda.

item.title: 7 Best Electric Scooters (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested two-wheelers will help you scoot scoot scoot around town.

item.title: Amazon CEO says 100,000 users now have Alexa+

item.title: Apple approves Spotify app update that allows U.S. users to access pricing info, external payment links
item.description: Spotify said on Friday that Apple has approved its U.S. app update that will allow users to access pricing information and external payment links. The...

item.title: 22 Best Portable Chargers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Keep your phone, laptop, handheld gaming console, and other electronics running with these travel-friendly power banks.

item.title: Reddit’s AI play is for the Google crowd, not just the community scrollers

item.title: I Thought Phone Lanyards Were Ugly—Until I Tried the Bandolier Bodie
item.description: It’s chic, understated, and an excellent alternative to an everyday handbag. No wonder it’s Taylor Swift–approved.
